<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Caligni Creeper](/Monsters.aspx?ID=65)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

The most widespread of the caligni are the mischievous caligni creepers.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 16

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 14

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 11
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Caligni_CaligniCreeper.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 2">[Caligni Creeper](/Monsters.aspx?ID=65)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="CN" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Small" />
<trait label="Caligni" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=210" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Bestiary](/Sources.aspx?ID=2) pg. 50

**Perception** +8; greater darkvision, light blindness

**Languages**
[Caligni](/Languages.aspx?ID=28)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +8, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +4, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +10, [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=17) +8

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +0

**Dex** +4

**Con** +3

**Int** -1

**Wis** +2

**Cha** +1
</row>

**Items**
[Black Smear Poison](/Equipment.aspx?ID=485) (3 doses), [Dagger](/Weapons.aspx?ID=3)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 19 

**Fort** +9 

**Ref** +10 

**Will** +6 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 30
(death flash)

</row>

**Death Flash** ([light](/Traits.aspx?ID=100)) When the caligni creeper dies, their body combusts in a flash of bright light. All creatures in a 10-foot emanation must succeed at a DC 17 Fortitude save or be blinded for 1d6 rounds. Creatures with light blindness who successfully save are still blinded for 1 round. The creeper’s gear and treasure are left in a pile where they died. As this isn’t a magical effect, the light has no effect within magical darkness.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
dagger +10 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 1d4+4 piercing plus [black smear poison](/Equipment.aspx?ID=485)

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
dagger +10 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [thrown 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 1d4 piercing plus [black smear poison](/Equipment.aspx?ID=485)

**Occult Innate Spells** DC 15
- **Cantrips (1st)**
[Detect Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=66)
- **2nd**
[Darkness](/Spells.aspx?ID=59) (at will)

**[Sneak Attack](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=34)**   The Caligni Creeper deals 1d6 extra [_precision_](/Rules.aspx?ID=340) damage to [_flat-footed_](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) creatures.

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-18" />
name: Caligni Creeper
